title: Epa Wei
lyrics:
Oh, ba- babylon girl, babylon girl
Hey
When I walked in I saw ya
Lights were fading out, fading out, for ya (that's right)
Haven't met you before, no

But I waited a lot, waited a lot for ya, yeah



So baby when you move, when you move like this

Move, when you move like this (stop)

When you move, when you move like that

I know I should stay back, woah, woah

Should we give it up?

Put that juice (?) in that cup

Sipping fast and wining slow

Should I stay or should I go?



Hey, epa, epa wei

Epa, epa, wei, wei, wei

Epa, epa, wei

Epa, epa, wei, wei, wei

Epa, epa wei

Epa, epa, wei, wei, wei

Won't you move like this?

I can't, can't walk away, no



How am I gonna find the words?

I didn't come alone again, wei

Somebody who comes, and she goes

She don't allow me to know

But it's all okay

I can't stand it no more

Watching you dancing low

It hurts, oh baby it hurts



Pegadita, así, como te gusta

Pegadita, así, como te gusta, bou

Dime si me quieres o no

Dime si me quieres o no

Oh, wei, wei

You got me twisted, I'm losing, I'm lifted

Ya no puedo más

Ya no puedo más, baby

Ya no puedo más, baby



Hey, epa, epa, wei

Epa, epa, wei, wei, wei

Epa, epa, wei

Epa, epa, wei, wei, wei

Epa, epa, wei

Epa, epa, wei, wei, wei

Won't you move like this?

I can't, can't walk away, no



Pegadita, así, como te gusta

Pegadita, así, como te gusta, bou

Dime si me quieres o no

Dime si me quieres o no



Hey, epa, epa, wei

Epa, epa, wei, wei, wei

Epa, epa, wei

Epa, epa, wei, wei, wei



I see in your eyes

Play with fire, but we can't take it

But we can't take it

And I realize the feelings alive

We shouldn't break it

Oh, we shouldn't break it



Just ven, epa, epa, wei

Epa, epa, wei

Oh, epa, epa, wei

Epa, epa, wei



I can't take it anymore, all this back and forth

Meet me by the door

Now, are you for sure?



Hey, epa, epa, wei

Epa, epa, wei, wei, wei

Epa, epa, wei

Epa, epa, wei, wei, wei

Epa, epa, wel

Epa, epa, wei, wei, wei

Won't you move like this?

I can't, can't walk away, no

Dime si me quieres o no
